title: Alumni Talk by Mr. Hussain Neralwala:How a chip is made: Conceptualization to Production
description: The EXTC Department of DBIT organized an alumni talk on “How a chip is made:Conceptualization to Production” on the 7th August, 2020.introduction, Mr. Hussain Neralwala took over and started the session by giving a brief introduction to his background in the field and his education.Further, he discussed about coupling of ‘MOS transistor’ with a brief introduction on‘Advent of VLSI’.
